title: Switch Gears Anytime
itunes:title: Switch Gears Anytime
description:
Today on the she we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners thought that Lavar Ball's comment towards Molly Qerim on the "First Take" show, of him saying  "You can switch gears with me anytime" was inappropriate. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to O.J Simpson followers for continuing to engage in his antics and after we allowed the listeners to keep The Breakfast Club humbled with "Slander The Breakfast Club".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
